name: discussion_entry_submitted
definition: The event is emitted anytime a user or system replies to a graded discussion topic.
trigger: Triggered when a user replies to a graded discussion topic or discussion thread.

schema.assignment_id: The Canvas id of the assignment if the discussion topic is graded.
schema.created_at: The time at which this entry was created.
schema.discussion_entry_id: The Canvas id of the newly added entry.
schema.discussion_topic_id: The Canvas id of the topic the entry was added to.
schema.parent_discussion_entry_id: If this was a reply, the Canvas id of the parent entry.
schema.submission_id: The Canvas id of the submission if the discussion topic is graded.
schema.text: The text of the post. NOTE: This field will be truncated to only include the first 8192 characters.
schema.user_id: The Canvas id of the user being that created the entry.
